mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, startDate, endDate, cost, description, createTime, createBy) VALUES (#{id},#{owner},#{name},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{cost},#{description},#{createTime},#{createBy})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy FROM tbl_activity a JOIN tbl_user b on a.`owner`=b.id where a.id=#{id}
